falcon:adk:clone.description: Clones an AppExchange Demo Kit (ADK) project from a remote Git repository.

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

outputdir.name: outputdir
outputdir.description: Directory to clone the AppExchange Demo Kit (ADK) project into

falcondebug.name: falcondebug
falcondebug.description: List of debug namespaces which should render output

falcondebugerror.name: falcondebugerror
falcondebugerror.description: Display extended information for uncaught Errors

falcondebugsuccess.name: falcondebugsuccess
falcondebugsuccess.description: Display extended information upon successful command completion

falcondebugdepth.name: falcondebugdepth
falcondebugdepth.description: Sets the depth of object inspection when debug output is displayed

args.name: GIT_REMOTE_URI
args.description: URI (https only) of the Git repository to clone (eg. https://github.com/GitHubUser/my-repository.git)

args.name: GIT_CLONE_DIR
args.description: Directory name of the cloned repository (defaults to repo name if not specified)

falcon:adk:create.description: Creates an AppExchange Demo Kit (ADK) project

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

outputdir.name: outputdir
outputdir.description: Directory where your ADK project will be created

falcondebug.name: falcondebug
falcondebug.description: List of debug namespaces which should render output

falcondebugerror.name: falcondebugerror
falcondebugerror.description: Display extended information for uncaught Errors

falcondebugsuccess.name: falcondebugsuccess
falcondebugsuccess.description: Display extended information upon successful command completion

falcondebugdepth.name: falcondebugdepth
falcondebugdepth.description: Sets the depth of object inspection when debug output is displayed

falcon:adk:install.description: Reads an AppExchange Demo Kit (ADK) Recipe and builds a customized org

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

projectdir.name: projectdir
projectdir.description: Path to a directory that contains a fully-configured ADK project

recipefile.name: recipefile
recipefile.description: Overrides 'demoRecipes' setting from sfdx-project.json to run a specific Recipe

extendedoptions.name: extendedoptions
extendedoptions.description: Options for overriding internal settings passed as a JSON string

falcondebug.name: falcondebug
falcondebug.description: List of debug namespaces which should render output

falcondebugerror.name: falcondebugerror
falcondebugerror.description: Display extended information for uncaught Errors

falcondebugsuccess.name: falcondebugsuccess
falcondebugsuccess.description: Display extended information upon successful command completion

falcondebugdepth.name: falcondebugdepth
falcondebugdepth.description: Sets the depth of object inspection when debug output is displayed
